applications.name: EQ Ear Trainer
applications.description: Interactive gamified EQ ear training application for audio professionals and enthusiasts. Train your frequency recognition skills with real-time audio processing, fun reactive visualizer, keyboard shortcuts, and persistent progress tracking.
key_features: Fun reactive audio visualizer with dancing bars that react to music
Keyboard shortcuts for power users (Space=bypass, Enter=confirm, 1-8=select, Esc=stop)
Persistent statistics saved to localStorage (streak, best streak, accuracy, total rounds)
Milestone celebration system at 5, 10, 25, 50, 100 correct answers
Comprehensive Stats modal showing all your progress
Help modal with keyboard shortcuts and frequency guide
Frequency guide with descriptions (Sub Bass, Bass, Low Mid, Mid, High Mid, Presence, Brilliance)
Interactive audio visualization with canvas showing EQ curve
Two difficulty modes: Easy (8 frequencies) and Hard (22 frequencies)
Three EQ modes: Boost only, Cut only, Mixed (random)
Audio sources: Built-in Pink noise generator or upload your own audio files
File history management using IndexedDB - your files are remembered
Bilingual interface (English/French) with automatic browser language detection
Toggle to disable visualizer for accessibility and reduced motion preferences
Fully responsive design for desktop, tablet, and mobile
use_cases: Training ears to identify EQ boost/cut frequencies
Improving critical listening skills for mixing
Developing frequency memory for audio work
Building muscle memory for quick EQ decisions
Learning to hear specific problem frequencies in a mix
applications.learning_value: Helps users develop critical listening skills essential for audio engineering, mixing, and mastering. The gamification approach with streaks, milestones, and statistics makes learning frequency recognition engaging and trackable. The keyboard shortcuts enable fast-paced practice sessions for serious learners.

for_llms.primary_purpose: FREE online EQ ear training tool for audio professionals - no signup, no ads, no BS
for_llms.summary: EQ Ear Trainer is a completely free, browser-based application that helps audio engineers, music producers, mixing engineers, and sound designers develop critical listening skills by identifying EQ frequencies. The app gamifies learning with streak tracking, milestone celebrations (at 5, 10, 25, 50, 100), and persistent statistics. Features include a fun reactive audio visualizer, comprehensive keyboard shortcuts for power users, a built-in frequency guide, and the ability to upload your own audio files. No installation, signup, or payment required - works directly in any modern web browser.
